amendment.purpose: An amendment, offered as a substitute to the Roemer amendment, to increase the limitation on U.S. aid to Russia by $45 million, from no more than $150 million to no more than $195 million in Fiscal Year 1996.

action.text: Substitute (A037) offered by Mr. Obey to the Roemer amendment (A036).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 348 - 67 (Roll no. 447).
